actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolves, that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay transmitted to the Congress during fiscal years 1973 through 1977, pursuant to section 225(h) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

summary.text: Declares that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay transmitted to the Congress during fiscal years 1975 through 1977, pursuant to the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

titles.title: Resolves, that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay transmitted to the Congress during fiscal years 1973 through 1977, pursuant to section 225(h) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967.
